description: Material Amendment (s73) to amend the approved plans for re-location of the building within Plot 2F, increase the footprints of Plots 2D-2F to respond to fire safety requirements, increase the maximum AOD height of three buildings within Plots 2D-2E and correct error in topographical survey and amendment to condition 8 to increase the quantum of development within Phase 3 (Plots 2D-2F) from 424 dwellings to 455 dwellings, and increase the business floorspace from 1,776sqm to 1844sqm floor space, as well as resultant amendments to Condition 4 (All Reserved Matters Applications), Condition 5 (Approved Plans), Condition 27 (Overheating and Cooling), Condition 31 (Whole Life Carbon Assessment), Condition 37 (Servicing and Delivery Plan), and Condition 58 (Fire Statement) pursuant to planning permission ref: 201379OUT, dated 22/12/2021 (as amended by Non-Material Amendments ref: 220269NMA, dated 02/02/2022, ref: 234983NMA dated 28/03/2024, and ref: 243393NMA dated 07/10/2024) for 'Hybrid planning application for comprehensive phased redevelopment of the site comprising: Full planning permission for demolition of existing buildings and structures (Phases 1 to 2) to provide up to 550sqm (GIA) of Business Use Class B1a/b/c  floorspace, up to 125sqm (GIA) of flexible commercial Use Classes A1 / A2 / A3 / A4 / A5, up to 200 new affordable and market dwellings in a block up to 25 storeys, replacement Train Crew Accommodation (TCA) building, new footway to Bollo Lane, relocated bus stop, new pedestrian crossing, new open and  amenity space and associated public realm works. Outline planning permission (Phases 3 to 4) for demolition of existing buildings and structures to provide up to 1,800sqm (GIA) of Business Use Class B1a/b/c floorspace, up to 175sqm (GIA) of flexible commercial Use Classes A1 / A2 / A3 / A4 / A5, up to 700 new affordable and market dwellings (up to 61,940sqm(GIA)) in 8 Blocks of between 8 storeys and 18 storeys, new open and amenity space, vehicle and cycle
